AI Description: Q-Chem is a comprehensive ab initio quantum chemistry software package designed for accurate electronic structure calculations of molecular systems. It provides a wide range of quantum mechanical methods to investigate the properties of systems at the atomic and molecular level.
Core Features: Ab Initio Quantum Chemistry Calculations, Electronic Structure Calculations, Molecular Properties Investigation, High-Level Quantum Mechanical Methods, Density Functional Theory Calculations
General Tags: Quantum Chemistry Software, Electronic Structure Calculations, Ab Initio Methods, Quantum Mechanical Simulations
